entry.title: Havanah Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Set
Price: 419.79 - 1999.00 (4 variants)

Mid-Century modern design is the inspiration for the Havana Collection. Wide, dramatic arms rise to the straight back that is synonymous with this classic style. Contrast toss pillows and an additional chair option are featured in a modern pattern to complement the teal fabric seating body covers. Tailored stitch tufting lends further accent to this thoroughly modern collection.

HAVANNA-1 Chair
HAVANNA-2 Loveseat
HAVANNA-3 Sofa

  • X Stitch Design
  • Gold Accents
  • Solid Wood Construction

entry.title: Nova Collection Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Set
Price: 1999.00

A fresh take on the classic chesterfield style, our Nova collection is covered in black for a contemporary feel. The striking set has tufting adding texture and shape while the rolled arms bring just the right amount of luxury. The large, deep seat cushions feature pocketed springs and velvet wraps for total comfort. The Nova collection has all the appeal of a classic style with the comfort of a modern design.

NOVA-1    Chair        
NOVA-2    Loveseat   
NOVA-3    Sofa          

  • Tufted Design
  • Soft Velvet Upholstery
  • Nailhead Trim Detailing

entry.title: Alexa Collection Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Set
Price: 1999.00

With a design that is driven by trend and style, the classic look of the Alexa Collection
blends with a number of modern and traditional settings. This Chesterfield style seating
group is offered in neutral tone fabric and features rhinestone tufting and a detailed arm
that transitions to encompass the entire back of each piece in the collection. The substantial size of this offering allows for maximum comfort that is enhanced by the accompanying nail head trim.

ALEXA-1    Chair         32"D 31"W 32"H
ALEXA-2    Loveseat   37"D 69"W 34.5"H
ALEXA-3    Sofa          37"D 90"W 34.5"H

  • Tufted With Rhinestones
  • Soft Velvet Upholstery
  • Nail head Trim Detailing

entry.title: Flora Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Set
Price: 3699.00

The eye-catching jewel tufting reflects with a brilliance intended to accentuate the coloring of the faux silk and the rich silver, with gold undertone finish of the show wood frame. With details such as shell and acanthus leaf scrolling, routed pilaster and cabriole legs, the traditional look of the collection is solidified. The accenting faux silk toss pillows feature traditional fringe detailing and a complementing detail pattern.

CHARLOTTE-1 Chair
CHARLOTTE-2 Love Seat
CHARLOTTE-3 Sofa

  • 13 Throw Pillows Included
  • No Assembly Required (detachable for easy entry through doorways)
  • Solid Wood Construction

entry.title: Caroline Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: Infiniteimports
Type: Sofa Set
Price: 849.99 - 3499.99 (4 variants)

The elaborate designs of Old World Europe are treated with a distinct modern
touch in the Caroline Collection. The eye-catching tufting reflects with a brilliance
intended to accentuate the coloring of the silk and the rich chocolate, with brown undertone finish of the show wood frame. With details such as shell and acanthus leaf scrolling, routed pilaster and cabriole legs, the traditional look of the collection is solidified. The accenting faux silk toss pillows feature traditional fringe detailing and a complementing detail pattern.

CRLNBRN-1 Chair
CRLNBRN-2 Love Seat
CRLNBRN-3 Sofa

  • No Assembly Required (detachable for easy entry through doorways)
  • Solid Wood Construction
